attributes.action: Do not cancel the local elections in may
attributes.additional_details: Parliament shoulx protect the electorates right to vote for their councillors.
attributes.background: Democracy cannot be cancelled the local elections should be held in May 25 and the electorate should be consulted on whether or not they want the government to impose the reorganisation of local goverment on them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
